name: aura-helper-sfdx
description: Aura Helper CLI aplication Tools converted into SFDX Plugin
author: Juan José Longoria López

ah:metadata.description: Topic with commands to work with Metadata types and files like list, describe, retrieve special types or compare metadata types and orgs among others.

local.description: Topic to group all metadata commands to work with the local project and stored Metadata Types and files

org.description: Topic to group all metadata commands to work with the project connected org

ah:package.description: Topic with commands to create XML Package and Destructive files from several sources. Create package and destructive files from GIT Changes to crete delta package. From Aura Helper JSON Metadata file or merge package and destructive files

git.description: Topic to group all commands related to create packages from git

json.description: Topic to group all commands related to create packages from Aura Helper Metadata JSON File

ah:git.description: Topic with commands to extract data related from git like Test Classes from commits comments

ah:data.description: Topic with commands work with data against the project connected org. Export or Import tree data without Salesforce

scripts.prepack: rimraf lib && tsc -b && oclif-dev manifest && oclif-dev readme
